short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarize any website in 5 bullet points powered by GPT-3

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get a summary in 5 bullet points or less of any website you like with just one click. Tweet summary included.
Powered by AI, 5 Bullets will help you keep up to date on those newsletters you have signed up with but have no time to read.  
Note: GPT-3 has a token limitation of 4000 if your page is very large it might go over the limit and not work.
